installCommand: corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@10.7.0 --activate && cd x402-packages && pnpm install && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 pnpm --filter x402 build && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 pnpm --filter x402-hono build && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 pnpm --filter x402-axios build && cd ../merchant-frontend && npm install
